hint: Push filters into the lowest possible join level, convert comma joins to explicit INNER JOINs for clarity, and pre-filter dimension tables before joining to reduce row counts early.
Isolate the selective date_dim filter in a CTE, then pre-filter other dimension tables into separate CTEs before joining with the fact table to minimize intermediate result sizes.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact tables into separate CTEs (using MATERIALIZED hint) to enforce optimal join order and avoid repeated scans, then perform final aggregation.
Break the query into independent subqueries for each MIN() aggregation, then combine results, or transform implicit joins to EXISTS subqueries to leverage anti-join optimizations.
